name: Twilio Voice Notifications Application
description: This reference app built in ReactJS for the Web demonstrates how to leverage Twilio Programmable Voice and Twilio SDKs to create a voice notifications system to make calls to your customers to deliver time-sensitive messages.

PASSCODE.description: Enter a passcode to protect your Voice Notification App. This will be required to use the application, keep it somewhere safe and secure.

ACCOUNT_SID.description: Enter your Twilio Account Sid. This information can be found on your Account Dashboard in the Twilio Console.

AUTH_TOKEN.description: Enter your Twilio Auth Token. This information can be found on your Account Dashboard in the Twilio Console.
